fire_dragon_boss.name: Ancient Fire Dragon
fire_dragon_boss.description: The legendary Ancient Fire Dragon, ruler of the mountains. Its breath can melt stone and its roar shakes the very earth.

special_abilities.name: Fire Breath
special_abilities.description: Deals massive fire damage to all enemies

special_abilities.name: Dragon Roar
special_abilities.description: Intimidates enemies, reducing their attack and defense

special_abilities.name: Wing Buffet
special_abilities.description: A powerful physical attack that may stun the enemy

phases.description: The dragon fights with typical draconic fury
Enraged by its wounds, the dragon becomes more aggressive
In its final moments, the dragon unleashes all its power

troll_king.name: Troll King
troll_king.description: The massive ruler of the underground tombs. Its enormous size and incredible strength make it a formidable opponent.

special_abilities.name: Earthquake Slam
special_abilities.description: Slams the ground, dealing damage and potentially stunning the player

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.description: Rapidly heals a portion of its health

phases.description: The Troll King becomes more vicious as it takes damage

shadow_lord.name: Shadow Lord
shadow_lord.description: A mysterious entity of pure darkness that rules the deepest parts of the ancient ruins.

special_abilities.name: Shadow Strike
special_abilities.description: A lightning-fast attack that pierces all defenses

special_abilities.name: Dark Portal
special_abilities.description: Summons shadows to aid in battle

special_abilities.name: Soul Drain
special_abilities.description: Drains the player's life force to heal itself

phases.description: The Shadow Lord reveals its true power
Desperate and dangerous, the Shadow Lord uses all its dark powers

ice_queen.name: Ice Queen
ice_queen.description: The ethereal ruler of the Crystal Caves, she commands the power of eternal winter.

special_abilities.name: Blizzard
special_abilities.description: A magical attack that freezes the enemy, reducing their speed

special_abilities.name: Ice Shield
special_abilities.description: Creates a protective barrier that reduces incoming damage

special_abilities.name: Frost Nova
special_abilities.description: Releases a burst of freezing energy

phases.description: The Ice Queen becomes more aggressive in defense of her domain
Desperation fuels her magical abilities

orc_chieftain.name: Orc Chieftain
orc_chieftain.description: The brutal leader of the orc clan in the Deep Woods, wielding a massive war axe.

special_abilities.name: War Cry
special_abilities.description: Roars to boost its own attack and intimidate the enemy

special_abilities.name: Heavy Strike
special_abilities.description: A devastating blow that ignores some defense

phases.description: Wounded but still fierce, the Chieftain fights with increased desperation

void_tyrant.name: Void Tyrant Kael'dor
void_tyrant.description: An ancient being of cosmic horror that dwells beyond reality itself. The strongest challenge.

swamp_hydra.name: Swamp Hydra
swamp_hydra.description: A massive serpentine beast dwelling in the poisonous waters of the Swamp of Shadows. Each head must be destroyed separately.

special_abilities.name: Venomous Bite
special_abilities.description: Delivers a toxic bite that causes poison damage over time

special_abilities.name: Multi-Head Attack
special_abilities.description: Attacks with multiple heads simultaneously

special_abilities.name: Toxic Cloud
special_abilities.description: Releases poisonous gas that affects all enemies

phases.description: The hydra attacks with its primary heads
The hydra grows more heads as it takes damage
The final heads of the hydra unleash devastating attacks

necromancer_lord.name: Necromancer Lord Vorthak
necromancer_lord.description: A master of dark magic who commands the undead from his throne in the Haunted Cemetery.

special_abilities.name: Army of the Dead
special_abilities.description: Summons skeletal warriors to fight alongside

special_abilities.name: Soul Harvest
special_abilities.description: Drains the life force of enemies to heal

special_abilities.name: Death Curse
special_abilities.description: Curses an enemy, causing damage over time

special_abilities.name: Bone Shield
special_abilities.description: Summons skeletal arms to block incoming attacks

phases.description: The necromancer begins to summon his undead army
Desperate, Vorthak unleashes his full dark power

storm_giant.name: Thunder Lord Thorigar
storm_giant.description: A colossal giant who commands the storms atop Thunder Peak, wielding a massive hammer forged from lightning.

special_abilities.name: Lightning Strike
special_abilities.description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike enemies

special_abilities.name: Thunder Clap
special_abilities.description: Creates a deafening roar that stuns and damages enemies

special_abilities.name: Storm Shield
special_abilities.description: Surrounds himself with crackling lightning that damages attackers

special_abilities.name: Meteor Smash
special_abilities.description: A devastating hammer strike that causes massive damage

phases.description: Thorigar fights with thunderous might
Enraged, the giant calls upon the full fury of the storm

lich_king.name: Lich King Malachar
lich_king.description: The undying ruler of the Crypt of Eternity, wielding ancient necromantic power that defies death itself.

special_abilities.name: Frost Blast
special_abilities.description: Releases a wave of necrotic cold that freezes enemies

special_abilities.name: Death's Embrace
special_abilities.description: Creates a zone of death energy that drains life

special_abilities.name: Army of Eternity
special_abilities.description: Raises powerful undead champions to fight

special_abilities.name: Soul Shackles
special_abilities.description: Binds the souls of enemies, preventing escape

special_abilities.name: Resurrection
special_abilities.description: Instantly revives with partial health

phases.description: The Lich King tests his power against intruders
Malachar summons his elite undead guardians
The Lich King reveals his ultimate power and immortality

demon_prince.name: Demon Prince Azgorath
demon_prince.description: The heir to the infernal throne, ruling from the heart of Hellfire Citadel with fiery wrath and demonic power.

special_abilities.name: Hellfire Inferno
special_abilities.description: Unleashes devastating fire damage to all enemies

special_abilities.name: Demon Summoning
special_abilities.description: Calls forth lesser demons to battle

special_abilities.name: Soul Cleave
special_abilities.description: A devastating attack that also damages MP

special_abilities.name: Demon Form
special_abilities.description: Transforms into a more powerful demonic state

special_abilities.name: Chaos Portal
special_abilities.description: Creates unstable portals that damage anyone nearby

phases.description: Azgorath fights with his demonic minions
The Demon Prince shows his true power
Azgorath enters his ultimate Demon Form

elder_dragon.name: Elder Dragon Zephyr
elder_dragon.description: An ancient dragon of immense power who guards the Sky Sanctuary, commanding the winds themselves.

special_abilities.name: Cyclone Breath
special_abilities.description: Unleashes a devastating wind attack that shreds defenses

special_abilities.name: Sky Dash
special_abilities.description: Blasts across the arena dealing massive damage

special_abilities.name: Tempest Shield
special_abilities.description: Surrounds with protective winds that deflect attacks

special_abilities.name: Wind Slash
special_abilities.description: Creates invisible blades of wind to slice enemies

special_abilities.name: Ancient Dragon's Roar
special_abilities.description: A terrifying roar that reduces all enemy stats

special_abilities.name: Divine Regeneration
special_abilities.description: Rapidly heals over time using ancient dragon magic

phases.description: Zephyr surveys his domain with regal calm
The elder dragon becomes more aggressive
Zephyr unleashes the full fury of the skies
The dragon's final stand with all powers unleashed
